Question & Options:
In the movie 'Jeena Sirf Merre Liye' (2002), which of the following statements are true regarding the character played by Kareena Kapoor?
Options:
A. A) Kareena Kapoor plays the role of Pooja Khanna.
B. B) Pooja Khanna is a supporting character in the movie.
C. C) Kareena Kapoor's character is named Pooja Khanna.
D. D) Pooja Khanna is portrayed by another actress.
Correct Answer: A) Kareena Kapoor plays the role of Pooja Khanna., C) Kareena Kapoor's character is named Pooja Khanna.
